panelCreateSteps.intro:
Welcome to the Panel Setup Page

Here, you can create a panel with learners and panellists.
Enter your preferred name of the panel.
Enter emails of panellists. These must be Andela emails, and must be entered one at a time.
Click the button to add the panellist's email.
This is where the invited panellists' emails are displayed.
Click this button to add a panel.
This is the space which contains cards for panels created.
Click this button to submit and finalise the panel creation process. This will also send the emails to the invited panellists.
